name: ZSNES Slot 1 Saved State File
summary: Learn about .ZS1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ZSNES provides numerous save states from 0 to 99 (file extensions .ZS0, ZS1, .ZS2, and so on). They can be saved using the "Save State" option under the "Game" menu.

NOTE: ZSNES save states are different than in-game save states. ZSNES save states may be created at any point during gameplay whereas in-game save states typically are controlled by the progress within the game.

description: File saved by ZSNES, a computer-based SNES emulator; stores a saved game snapshot that can be loaded at another time; used to save and load game progress.
